title: Female Teacher Can't Resist Male Student Who Gets Horny from Her Wet Clothes Due to a Sudden Storm, Moe Tenshi
overview: Moe, a teacher and a basketball club adviser, returns to school on a sudden storm day, soaking wet without an umbrella. Then a male student practicing basketball alone... A school with no one else, a gymnasium with just the two of us. A student who can't suppress his lust in a transparent bra... Moe is pressed... A mistake that repeats over the wall that should not be crossed between the teacher and the student...
